metadata.Title: CVE-2020-9355 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
danfruehauf NetworkManager-ssh before 1.2.11 allows privilege escalation because extra options are mishandled.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-9355` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

network-manager-ssh - 1.2.11-1
network-manager-ssh-gnome - 1.2.11-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: network-manager-ssh package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.11-1').
